name: UNDERLIER: Deeper; Darker (Black and White Jam №11)
name_original: UNDERLIER: Deeper; Darker (Black and White Jam №11)
description:
UNDERLIER: Deeper; Darker (Black and White Jam №11)

Made in GB Studio.

Controls:

  • D-Pad:
    Arrow Keys / WASD
    (Movement)
  • A Button:
    Control / F
    (Interact)
  • Start Button:
    Enter / Return
    (Advance/Exit on certain screens)
  • Select Button:
    Shift
    (...)

If you like what I'm doing and want to help me make more of it, consider becoming a supporter on Patreon.

Thanks for looking!
